text: Miitopia is a role playing video game for the Nintendo 3DS, 2DS and Switch. Players can be one of many class of Mii characters. These include Mage, Princess, Warrior, Flower, Cleric and Vampire. The goal of the game is to defeat the Dark Lord and become the world's greatest hero. To do this, the player must defeat many monsters. They can get new powers whenever they defeat a monster. This is called "Leveling Up". Each class has its own powers. For example, if the character is a Mage, they can get spells such as Fire or Lightning. == Plot == The game starts with the Hero walking around Greenhorne. Meanwhile, the Dark Lord begun to steal Mii faces. When the hero gets to the town of Greenhorne, the Dark Lord steals the the faces of the townspeople. The hero then goes to save the faces of the townspeople.
